Name: Hentai Animation Puzzle
About the game: Hentai Animation Puzzle is a puzzle game, in which all you need is to swop pieces, in order to make the pictures and animations restored. This game is aiming to make you relax and enjoy life, with a bit of challenge. The '?' button can help you pass all the levels, if you are having problems with them. -Nudity or sexual content -All scenes within the game are consensual -Not suitable for watching at work -Not suitable for all ages -All characters in the game are over 18 years old
